item.description:
I am sure that many have heard or viewed the movie "The Secret." Usually soon after, most became intrigued in wanting to know more about the Law of Attraction. Some even have manifested this meetup.

However, did you know that before "The Secret" phenom, Esther and Jerry Hicks shared the teachings of the nonphysical entity Abraham as channeled through Esther?

On this inspirational DVD,

Esther and Jerry Hicks present the teachings of the Non-Physical entity Abraham, whom Esther calls infinite intelligence and Jerry refers to as the purest form of love I have ever encountered.

Abraham explains the law of attraction and the power of positive thinking. Jerry and Esther also share stories of their life together, their life-changing experiences and their path to the collective consciousness known as Abraham.

Cast: Jerry Hicks, Esther Hicks

Genres: Faith & Spirituality, Mindfulness

Please join us as we view this uplifting film and discuss its mystery.

We will be meet from 7:00pm-9:30pm.
See you there! 

Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: The Secret Behind the Secret: Movie & Discussion
